import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Button, Col, Container, Form, Row } from 'react-bootstrap' export const TransForm = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState(); const handleOnChange = (e) => { const{value, name} = e.target; console.log(value, name) setFormData({ formData, [name]: value, }) } console.log(formData) return ( <>
) }
